title: Haddock Crumble with Tomatoes and Peppers

ingredients.content: 100 g green pepper, cut in pieces (1 cm)
100 g red pepper, cut in pieces (1 cm)

preparations.content: Place all ingredients in mixing bowl and chop <b>10 sec/speed 6<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place garlic, onions, oil and tomatoes in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Sauté <b>5 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add green pepper, red pepper, wine and bay leaf. Place Varoma into position and weigh in haddock then steam <b>20 min/Varoma//speed 1<b>. Towards the end of this time preheat oven to 200°C.

Remove Varoma. Transfer sauce to an oven-proof dish (approx. 30 cm x 20 cm). Add steamed haddock to baking dish then spread reserved olive crumble over it. Bake for 10 minutes (200°C). Serve hot with a salad.
